experience.title: Math Tutor
bullets: Provide individualized instruction in Algebra, Precalculus, and Calculus; adapt explanations to diverse learning styles.
Break down complex problems into clear, structured steps and track progress over time.
Communicate performance updates to parents and supervisors.

experience.title: Front End Web Development Intern
bullets: Maintained and updated production website components supporting high-traffic consumer pages.
Implemented content and layout updates using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript within an existing design system.
Identified and resolved UI display issues across browsers and screen sizes; collaborated with designers and QA.

experience.title: Camp Counselor
bullets: Led and supervised a group of 15 campers in a fast-paced, team-based environment, ensuring safety, engagement, and inclusion.
Planned and adapted daily activities to accommodate different personalities, energy levels, and accessibility needs.
Resolved interpersonal conflicts and communicated effectively with staff and parents to support positive experiences.
